revised_title: Royal Society Portraits and Missing Presidents
tldr: This article discusses the Royal Society's collection of portraits and highlights the missing portraits of some of its past presidents. The author encourages readers to help fill these gaps by providing information on any available portraits. The collection is not only a treasure trove of art but also preserves the features of many great scientists who have contributed to the society's history.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Art history
